nodes.text: Ruusan 2, also known as the Ruusan moon, was one of the three moons that orbited the planet Ruusan located in the Teraab sector's Ruusan system of the galaxy's Mid Rim, in grid square P-11 on the Standard Galactic Grid. During the Clone Wars, it was the location of Skytop Station, a secret Separatist listening post.
